title: SVG header
content:
[[iftags +component]] [[module css]] #page-content tr td:first-child { text-align: right; } #page-content tr td:last-child { background: #eee; } .templateInfo{ margin: 0 0 1em; padding: 0 1em; border: 1px solid hsl(0, 0%, 87%); } .templateInfo hr{ margin: 1em 0; } .templateInfo h1, .templateInfo h2{ text-align: center; } .code{display:none;} [[/module]] [[note]] **Author:** [[*user 7happy7]] ---- **Ported By:** [[*user Mang Gwan]] [[/note]] [[div class="templateInfo"]] + How to use ---- ++ 1. Copy the following > @@[[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader@@ > @@|lv=@@ > @@|threat=@@ > @@|item=@@ > @@|oc=@@ > @@|oc2=@@ > @@|pend=@@ > @@]]@@ ---- ++ 2. Read the guide [[table]] [[row]] [[cell]] Start of Include Block ▷ [[/cell]] [[cell]] @@[[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader@@ [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] Clearance Level Number ▷ [[/cell]] [[cell]] |lv={{1-6}} [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/niveaux-de-menace-des-objets-scp Threat Level] ▷ [[/cell]] [[cell]] |threat={{white/}} {{blue/}} {{green/}} {{orange/}} {{red/}} {{black/}} {{undefined}} [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] Item Number ▷ [[/cell]] [[cell]] ##blue||item=##{{XXXX}} [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] Object Class ▷ [[/cell]] [[cell]] ##blue||oc=##{{safe/}} {{euclid/}} {{keter/}} {{thaumiel/}} {{other}} [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] Object Class 2 __(Optional)__ ▷ **Object Class would be strikethrough** [[/cell]] [[cell]] ##blue||oc2=##{{safe/}} {{euclid/}} {{keter/}} {{thaumiel/}} {{other}} [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] Pending Blink __(Optional)__ ▷ **Object Class 2 would be blinking** **Object Class would NOT be strikethrough** (Defaults to "false") [[/cell]] [[cell]] |pend={{true/false}} [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] End of Include Block ▷ [[/cell]] [[cell]] @@]]@@ [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] +++ For the ##blue|blue parts##, you may insert any text you like. BUT if special characters are used, please use the encoder below. [[iframe https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--code/component:svgheader/1 style="width: 100%; height: 225px; border: none;"]] [[code type="HTML"]]

[[/code]] [[/div]] [[div class="templateInfo"]] + Examples ---- > @@[[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader@@ > @@|lv=0@@ > @@|threat=undefined@@ > @@|item=XXXX@@ > @@|oc=Euclid@@ > @@]]@@ [[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader-backend |lv=0 |threat=undefined |item=XXXX |oc=Euclid |oc2=false ]] ---- > @@[[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader@@ > @@|lv=3@@ > @@|threat=green@@ > @@|item=XXXX@@ > @@|oc=Safe@@ > @@|oc2=(Pending)@@ > @@|pend=true@@ > @@]]@@ [[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader-backend |lv=3 |threat=green |item=XXXX |oc=Safe |oc2=(Pending) |pend=true ]] ---- > @@[[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader@@ > @@|lv=6@@ > @@|threat=red@@ > @@|item=XXXX@@ > @@|oc=Euclid@@ > @@|oc2=Thaumiel@@ > @@]]@@ [[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader-backend |lv=6 |threat=red |item=XXXX |oc=Euclid |oc2=Thaumiel |pend=false ]] ---- [[/div]] ---- [[div class="templateInfo"]] + [/component:svgheader-backend Source Code] [[/div]] ---- [[/iftags]] [[include :scp-wiki:component:svgheader-backend |lv={$lv} |threat={$threat} |item={$item} |oc={$oc} |oc2={$oc2} |oc2=false |pend={$pend} |pend=false ]]
author: Mang Gwan
